mapper.select: SELECT p.ProjectID, p.ShortName, p.Description, p.StartDate, p.EndDate, p.ActualStartDate, p.ActualEndDate, p.Status FROM Project p
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Project( ShortName, Description, StartDate, EndDate, ActualStartDate, ActualEndDate, Status )VALUES ( #{shortName}, #{description}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{actualStartDate}, #{actualEndDate}, #{status} )
mapper.update: UPDATE Project SET ShortName = #{shortName}, Description = #{description}, StartDate = #{startDate}, EndDate = #{endDate}, ActualStartDate = #{actualStartDate}, ActualEndDate = #{actualEndDate}, Status = #{status} WHERE ProjectID = #{projectID}
